property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: Password to use against metastore database

property.name: hive.metastore.schema.verification
property.description: Enforce metastore schema version consistency. False is recommended for development environments.

property.name: datanucleus.autoCreateSchema
property.description: Auto-create necessary schema on a startup if doesn't exist.

property.name: datanucleus.fixedDatastore
property.description: If true, prevents schema modifications after initial creation.

property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: Location of default database for the warehouse. Using S3A URI for MinIO storage.

property.name: hive.exec.scratchdir
property.description: HDFS scratch space for temporary files (queries, etc). Should be globally writable.

property.name: hive.metastore.try.direct.sql
property.description: Use direct SQL queries instead of DataNucleus for metadata. Improves performance with RDBMS metastores.

property.name: hive.txn.manager
property.description: Set to DbTxnManager for ACID transaction support.
